item.source: Carnage • Dedicated to bringing you the best content

item.title: Carnage • Dedicated to bringing you the best content
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Thanks guys!

Plenty of content for players to enjoy over the summer and we’re constantly improving by the day!

Few new interfaces players can interact with


Strange rocks now have a rare on their drop table. This is an extremely rare chance, but should give some incentive to skilling as you could get it! Agility has been fixed. Yes, that means you have to do the whole course now! Bank space has been increased to 800 which was double the previous amount. You can purchase this by right clicking a bank booth and opening the bank settings. Loyalty interface has been fixed and the majority of bugs have been ironed out. You can find the loyalty rewards in the shop by speaking to Lady Servil, located outside of Edgeville bank Banking now has the option to withdraw "all but one" on all items. Drop rates of npcs have been changed to account for our growing player base. Player movement bug has been fixed so players shouldn't glitch across the map when doing agility or pest control With the introduction of loyalty, I have decided to implement coloured titles 6e827ff3e5df856bc3f57c6eaf74bb59.png Thieving cash has been decreased slightly A rare has been added to the auth code drop table with an extremely rare chance A rare has been added to the crystal key drop table with an extremely rare chance Bandos, armadyl, steadfast boots, glaiven boots and ragefire boots have been removed from the Crystal key/Auth code drop table Crystal keys can now be imbued Imbued crystal keys can give a double reward at the chest or a chance of a rare item as well as a regular item from the list May have found the cause of the random char resets, hopefully this fix will be the end of them.
Added extra stages to the login tutorial to give new players more information about the server An attempt to re-do all the layout of the server to give it a 'unique feel', starting with the rules interface on login Re-done some of the online player list Fixed boss instancing Fixed a bug with the CAG that crashed the server Lowered drop rates again slightly. Some ironman shop restrictions have been removed Added white knights next to the edgeville dungeon entrance, just a little variation if people get bored. They drop good items, with a really low drop rate as well as some common items that you may need. Fixed a bug with coloured clan tags in the client where you right click players. Fixed a bug with pathfinding where the server would keep checking for paths even if your enemy is dead Fixed a bug with avatar where the npcs wouldn't die as the boss died. Added the majority of bosses to the boss task list. More to come tomorrow
Metal dragons have been added to the game (bronze, iron, steel and mithril). They are located in Brimhaven dungeon. They have also been added to the slayer task list. Player map states have been fixed and they should no longer stay disabled. A bug has been fixed with player kits A bug has been fixed with the max hit interface displaying inaccurate range damage A bug has been fixed with the max hit interface where your right click options wouldn't update when it's enabled. Inferno adze is can now mine Primal pickaxe is now functional as a pickaxe and requires 81 mining to use. Mining timers have been altered to support the new addition (primal pickaxe) Two new bosses have been added New items have been introduced to the game (Blood necklace, split dragontooth necklace (metal dragons), hand cannon kit (barrelchest)) More trivia questions have been added The notorious ranging bug against npcs has been fixed DFS special has been fixed so you can no longer use the special on dead players/npcs Spent some time adding support for new boss mechanics which will make it easier for me to add strategic bosses in the future Metal dragons have been nerfed Hand cannon kit has been introduced. Barrelchest drops the parts, then you will need to put them together. This requires 75 crafting and 80 smithing.

Read full topic
